overview: A Kannada slapstick comedy about 3 young boys who wish to turn into grown-ups by experiencing the wild side of the life, which is having sex. They get on with the task by visiting a red light area. From here begins a non-stop, rib tickling action as they get blackmailed by a Pimp and an escapade with the girls from brothel. While they are being chased, the boys grow up learning lessons of life.
title: Parari
